document.full_text: vera farmiga first caught hollywood's eye in low-budget film "down to the bone," then vaulted to fame when she was nominated for a best supporting actress oscar in 2010, playing a traveling businesswoman in "up in the air."
document.title: a minute with: vera farmiga on movies, motherhood
lines_and_colors: vera farmiga first caught hollywood's eye in low-budget film "down to the bone," then vaulted to fame when she was nominated for a best supporting actress oscar in 2010, playing a traveling businesswoman in "up in the air."
